scripts.build: npm run build:web && npm run build:api
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e
scripts.lint: npm run lint:web && npm run lint:api
scripts.lint:api: cd platform/api && black --check src/ && isort --check-only src/
scripts.format: npm run format:web && npm run format:api
scripts.format:api: cd platform/api && black src/ && isort src/
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd web && npm install && cd ../platform/api && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../mobile && npm install
scripts.setup:db: cd platform/api && python -c "from src.models.database import engine; import asyncio; asyncio.run(engine.create_all())"
